attributes.action: David Cameron should debate Nigel Farage on EU membership in a live TV debate
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has offered to debate Cameron live on TV on the claims made in the government leaflet sent to each household regarding the benefits of remaining in the EU. I believe Cameron will not accept this as Farage would expose the lies. Sign this to push for open debate on this important issue.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It would be up to television companies to arrange a debate and to invite people to attend.
